job_description:
Our client is an innovative Saas company working in loyalty marketing and point-of-sale service industry and is looking for a

Sr. Software Developer

to join their team in Hamilton. In the role, you will create a seamless software experience and improve existing/future projects.

Responsibilities

Collaborate and lead a team of engineering to determine best practices
Solve technical problems with various complexities
Analyze and test programs, troubleshoot where required
Seek new ways to improve software processes

Qualifications

Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or relevant field
5 years' or more experience working with Ruby/Ruby on Rails/RoR
Strong background with various web technologies
Experience working in fullstack position
Previous experience working with Docker/Kubernetes and GCP considered an asset

If this sounds like a role where you could excel, please apply today! MacDonald Search Group works with our clients to build diverse, high performing teams, reflective of the Canadian employment landscape. All applications are considered.
